title: Vuelta a España Stage 9: Adam Yates Stuns with 58km Solo Attack to Reignite GC Hopes
content:
Briton races back into contention on grueling Vuelta mountain stage, as does Richard Carapaz while O'Connor keeps rivals in check.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 9: Adam Yates Stuns with 58km Solo Attack to Reignite GC Hopes on Velo.
author: sstokes
